message: Let's be reasonable. Take this offer, Bob, or the pie shrinks quickly for both of us!
Let's split things a bit more fairly this time, Alice.  Every round counts!
Bob, the clock is ticking, and your share is evaporating. I'm being fair, but this is my last compromise!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
